name: Vector Portrait Tutorial File
description:
Vector Portrait using basic shapes. Watch Tutorial with Resources at Youtube. Link Below

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uY_502b0LQ4


Lot of people wonder if one can create some flat or detailed Illustrattions in Figma. So, I created this tutorial for everyone to follow along.


This includes a lot of tips, tricks and resources. From how to Choose a reference To How to add details, everything is included in the detailed Youtube video
